observation: Verify Global - FAI/AS9102 Trainings, Validations and Verifications  Skip to content Menu Why Verify About Leadership News Solutions Supplier Qualification & Selection Requirements Flow Down Planning & Product Qualification Verification & Validation Performance Monitoring Performance Improvement First Article Inspections (FAI) Product Part Verification Center (PPVC) Supply Chain Risk Management (SCRM) Case Studies Resources Blog Videos Service Briefs Events FAQs Locations Careers Employment Opportunities Contract Opportunities (Field Services) Contact Login English ▼ Français Deutsch 日本語 Español Home 2024-04-16T09:07:23-07:00 The Global Leader in Supply Chain Risk Management Solutions Leading global enterprises across all industry sectors choose Verify to eliminate supply chain risk and assure compliance. We provide outsourced solutions to ensure our highly qualified resources have everything they need to deliver quality products on time. Our Proven Process for Optimizing Supply Chains Our six-phase Supplier Performance Management (SPM) lifecycle, process, and the tasks necessary to ensure compliance with flow down requirements is how we help customers and suppliers deliver quality products on time. 1 Capability & Capacity Assessments 2 Contract Review / Compliance Assurance 3 4 Source Inspection 5 Surveillance Audits 6 Supplier Management 0 + Qualified Field Resources Supplier Locations Countries Where We Operate Years of Industry Leadership Suppliers Evaluated % Of A&D Fortune 100 Companies Served Providing risk management and mitigation solutions in essential supply chains for 45+ years Since 1976, Verify has continued to deliver innovative, industry-leading ideas and solutions to improve suppliers’ mission and business performance. We envision a world where supply chain risk is eliminated and suppliers always deliver quality products on time. We’re working hard to make our vision your reality. Our Story How We Eliminate Uncertainty Our fully-managed, outsourced solutions incorporate people, processes, technology, and facilities to improve the quality, sustainability, and effectiveness of your supply chain. Experienced People Our global network of subject matter experts ensures we provide the correct oversight for any challenge. Proven Processes Best practice standard operating procedures consistently deliver process control and optimization. Applications Comprehensive SaaS applications produce proactive, actionable intelligence regarding your supply chain. Secure Global Facilities Secure, scalable, outsourced facilities are available at every Verify office and other strategic locations. Case Study: The supplier for this defense systems OEM leader was experiencing a 25% first pass rate, resulting in a direct, costly impact on mission success. Discover how Verify helped the supplier and OEM customer improve their understanding of AS9102 requirements, repair their working relationship, and dramatically improve their FAI First Pass Approval rate in a few short months. Read the Case Study Upholding The Industry’s Highest Standards We’re proud to be recognized by these leading industry associations as we continue to raise the bar for supply chain risk management solutions. Why Choose Verify Global We tailor proven solutions to your organization to help you achieve your quality and delivery objectives. Complying with Industry Standards Our solutions include AS9145 and AS9102 consulting, training, planning, readiness reviews, online platforms, and fully managed programs. Scale Rapidly Our services and solutions are designed to scale quickly to respond to your evolving requirements. Work with Experienced Partners 45+ years of award-winning, verified experience in A&D and other quality-critical industries means your projects are in good hands. Gain Industry-Leading Insight Our extensive industry oversight enables us to develop solutions that help you improve performance. Learn More Tailored Solutions for a Global Supply Chain Our global network of over 8,000 experienced field resources means we can monitor suppliers on-site around the world. Global Headquarters Global Network View All Locations Mitigate risks that can compromise your success Let us show you how our fully managed solutions can help your enterprise identify, assess, and mitigate risk across the end-to-end supply chain. News & Insights from Our Experts 2023-07-11T10:32:03-07:00 Change of Business Address June 28, 2023 | We are pleased to be able to confirm that Verify, Inc. have recently completed our office move in California with our new business address being as follows (effective July 3, 2023): 3100 Bristol Street, Suite 200, Costa Mesa, CA 92626. It would be greatly appreciated if you could update your internal systems to reflect this change. We can also confirm that all email, phone, fax and account details remain unchanged. Please do not hesitate to engage your Verify point of contact should you have any questions or require additional information. 2023-05-25T12:45:09-07:00 Workforce Challenges Prove a Headwind to the Growing Aerospace and Defense Industry May 25, 2023 (Arlington, Va.) — The Aerospace Industries Association (AIA) and PwC just released a new study highlighting the labor market dynamics facing aerospace and defense (A&D) companies today. The qualitative report analyzes the latest workforce trends and offers strategies for businesses as they seek to recruit and retain top talent amid unprecedented demand. ETI Report Calls for Action on Hypersonics Supply Chain Arlington, VA – NDIA’s Emerging Technologies Institute announces the public launch of its newest report, Hypersonics Supply Chains: Securing the Path to the Future, which calls for the Department of Defense to take action on securing its hypersonics supply chain. The report’s launch event will take place virtually at NDIA.org/hypersonics on May 11 from 1:00 pm – 3:00 pm, with the report embargo set to be lifted at 9:00 am that day. thought: I see that the website is about supply chain risk management, which is a legitimate business. I don't see any characteristics of a scam website based on the content. The website https://www.verifyglobal.com/ is not a scam website.
